places_with_reviews.name: Bheemas Regency
address: 20/29(P),V.B.S ROAD, HBG Nagar, Adoni, Andhra Pradesh 518301, India

reviews.text:
Rooms were dusty, cleaning only in the morning. Toilet had leaky pipes. Door of the toilet had no stopper so automatically closing & also floor is very slippery. While vacating charged Rs.20 extra for each day of stay. They say free breakfast in their site but they never gave anything for 4 days of my stay. No mention by any of the recepyionist there. This happened in Nov'23.
Now in Dec'23 when I was forced to book a room there they say no room but in online sites they are showing the same. Overall disappointing experience. Romm also has cockroaches. Maintenance very poor.

I have visited this place for my business purposes. The ambiance of this residence is very old and service is very bad. More over I have faced a problem I.e I got checked in at night. At that time he said some charges for that I accepted but after getting checkout another person said that they said the amount in by mistake. They charged more in the morning and also he is arguing with me.
So please check it out while getting in to this residence. And also they are not providing water too for that they are charging water bottles with cost. They are charging more price comparing with the price which they are shown in online.
Good service,  friendly staff old building but satisfied 😁😁 very reasonable price
Good place, convenient location, budget hotel, friendly staff.
Everything is superb osm feeling good service location every thing.

places_with_reviews.name: Rajshri Hotelires pvt ltd
address: Railway Station Road, HBG Nagar, Adoni, Andhra Pradesh 518301, India

reviews.text: Rajshri Hotelires Pvt Ltd exceeded all my expectations! From the moment I stepped in, I was greeted with warmth and professionalism. The staff went above and beyond to ensure my stay was comfortable and memorable. The rooms were impeccably clean, and the amenities provided were top-notch. The food served at the restaurant was absolutely delicious, offering a diverse range of options to cater to every palate. The attention to detail and level of service truly set this hotel apart. Whether you're traveling for business or leisure, I highly recommend Rajshri Hotelires Pvt Ltd for an exceptional experience!

Rajshri Hotelires pvt ltd is offering premium services at budget prices.
I personally experienced this while my stay at one of their properties. Spacious and squeaky clean room, neat and tidy washroom, quick room service were some highlights during my stay. Its a really good option if you plan to stay here.
One of the best hospitality i have ever soon, Room service was good and bathrooms were hygienic. staff was very cooperative and their behavior was too supportive

My recent stay here was exceptional. From the moment I arrived, the staff greeted me warmly and made me feel right at home. Spacious and tidy rooms with all amenities.
Superb food and staff behaviour. Would recommend to everyone looking for a memorable stay.

I had two days stay here in Rajshri hoteliers, I found that the staff has very gentle and warm approaches to me, smooth check-in and check-out. A genuine kind of room service I received in these two days of halt. Rooms are very tidy and clean and I found very timely availability of room service, and punctuality in good quality meal offering. Honestly, this made my mind very peaceful. Thanks for this nice service.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Dwarka
address: J7CG+53C, HBG Nagar, Adoni, Andhra Pradesh 518301, India

reviews.text: The lodge is really nice, with clean beds, and it's super close to the train station. This makes it one of the best places to stay. The beds are not just comfy but also really clean. Being so near the railway station is a big plus because it's convenient for travelers. So, if you want a cozy place with comfy beds that's also near the train station, this lodge is a great choice.

places_with_reviews.name: Capital O 61155 Chekuri Residency
address: SH 33, RTC Colonly, Adoni, Andhra Pradesh 518301, India

reviews.text: Clean place, good staff behaviour, nice stay

This is the definition of how a hotel room should be. After a long time and many travels across many cities, I find this hotel to be perfect in cleanliness, 24 hr hot water, spacious room, an AC that works in silence.
Towel and soap provided.
I felt it's worth paying for this hotel, usually used to stay expensive but dirty mantralayam or raichur hotels.

Cons:
parking is on road side,
I didn't ask for wifi service since we were on pilgrimage,
The restaurant next to this which used to serve awesome avakai biryani has closed down,
It's an hour and a half to mantralayam, 2hrs to kallur Lakshmi temple.

I just hope they maintain this hotel with the same cleanliness and be a model for Raichur, mantralayam and kurnool hotels.
Superb rooms
Nice and spacious,
Soooo
